extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Traveler...
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Voyageur...

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig:
You descended into 
the depths of this crater.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text:
Vous êtes descendu dans
les profondeurs de ce cratère.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig:
Getting ever so close
to your destination.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text:
Vous rapprochant toujours
plus de votre destination.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig:
Yet there is one last trial
for you to pass.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text:
Mais il reste encore une dernière épreuve
à surmonter.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig:
The time has come
for you to demonstrate...
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text:
Le temps est venu
pour vous de démontrer...

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig:
The full extent
of your proficiency.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text:
... l'étendue de
toutes vos compétences.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: G: The Journey
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: RDC : Le Voyage

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: B1: The Approaching
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: SS1 : L'Approche

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: B2: The Arrival
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: SS2 : L'Arrivée

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: B3: The Impact
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: SS3 : L'Impact

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: B4: The Message
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: SS4 : Le Message

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Jump Up
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Sauter en Haut

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Back To Lookout
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Retour au Point de Vue

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Bonjour, chérie!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Bonjour, Chérie !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Hi!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Salut !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: I promised I'd call, non?
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: J'ai promis que j'appellerais, non ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Man, this dungeon has going on for so long already...
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Hé ben...\. Ce donjon dure déjà depuis un moment...

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: But I think we're getting close to the finish line.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Mais je crois qu'on se rapproche de la ligne d'arrivée.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Let us see who will be first!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: On va voir qui de nous deux va arriver première !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: [nods]
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: [acquiesce]

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Well... not that it really matters who'll be there first.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Bon... Non pas que ça soit vraiment important de qui va arriver en premier.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: It has been really nice to run the dungeon with everyone else.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: C'était vraiment cool de pouvoir faire le donjon avec tout le monde.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Especially since there have been so many places where you can see other players.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Surtout vu tous les endroits où on pouvait voir les autres joueurs.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: And...\. that will be it, I suppose?
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Et...\. je crois que c'est tout, j'imagine ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: The final dungeon of CrossWorlds.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Le donjon final de CrossWorlds.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: The end of the game.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: La fin du jeu.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: [shakes head]
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: [secoue la tête]

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Wait...
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Attends...

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Don't worry, chérie!\. It definitely won't be the end for me!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Ne t'inquiète pas, chérie !\. Pour moi c'est loin d'être fini !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Because you're in this game and you're my friend.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Parce que tu es dans ce jeu et que tu es mon amie.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: At the very least I'll login to drop by and visit you!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Je vais au moins me logguer pour passer te voir !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Thanks...
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Merci...

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Come on, that's what friends do!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Roh allez, c'est ce que font les amis !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: See you at the end!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: On se voit à l'arrivée !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Bye!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Bye !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: This new enemy type has been breaking in mass fights.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Ce nouveau type d'ennemis plantait souvent lors des grands combats.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Apparently they fixed it and I want to test it.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Apparemment ils ont corrigé ça et je voudrais bien le tester.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: So...\. let's see who can defeat more!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Donc...\. voyons voir qui peut en vaincre le plus !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig:
Keep fighting the enemy type.
Leave toward the south to skip.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text:
Continuez de combattre ce type d'ennemi.
Sortez par le sud pour sauter.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Defeated Fishes: \c[3]\v[tmp.radfish.kill]\c[0]
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Poissons vaincus : \c[3]\v[tmp.radfish.kill]\c[0]

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig:
Your journey has continued 
for a long time.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text:
Votre trajet était si long
et éprouvant.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.note: this de, approximatively... ok, not really.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig:
You traveled far
and passed every trial.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text:
Vous avez voyagé loin
et réussi toutes les épreuves.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig:
Finally, you have reached
your destination.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text:
Enfin, vous avez atteint
votre destination.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig:
You, the traveler, 
the envoy of change.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text:
Vous, le voyageur.
L'émissaire du changement.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig:
Your task in this world
has been fulfilled.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text:
Votre tâche dans ce monde
a été remplie.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig:
As such, you are now ready
to proceed further.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text:
Et vous êtes donc prêt
pour continuer plus loin.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig:
Start your journey 
once more.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text:
Pour commencer votre voyage
une nouvelle fois.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig:
Because life is there
for you to grow.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text:
Parce que la vie est là
pour vous faire grandir.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig:
And growth will only happen
as your journey continues.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text:
Et que la croissance n'arrivera
que si votre voyage continue.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig:
Forming your path
with every step you take.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text:
Et façonne votre chemin
à chacun de vos pas.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig:
Traveler, we will await
your arrival.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text:
Voyageur, nous attendrons
votre arrivée.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig:
In a new world
full of wonder.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text:
Dans un nouveau monde
plein de merveilles.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig:
\s[1]The gods leave you one last present
\i[element-heat]\i[element-cold]\i[element-shock]\i[element-wave]
\c[3]You get +1 CP in each Elemental Circuit!\c[0]
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text:
\s[1]Les dieux vous laissent un dernier présent
\i[element-heat]\i[element-cold]\i[element-shock]\i[element-wave]
\c[3]Vous gagnez +1 CP dans tous les Circuits Élémentaires !\c[0]

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Seeker, we have finally found it.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: \v[lore.title.seeker], nous l'avons enfin trouvé.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: The \c[3]Secret of the Ancients\c[0].
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Le \c[3]Secret des Anciens\c[0].

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Right at this very moment you are standing in front of it.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: En ce moment même vous vous trouvez juste devant.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: A \c[3]portal to a new world\c[0].
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Un \c[3]portail vers un nouveau monde\c[0].

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: A technological achievement beyond our current understanding.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Une prouesse technologique au-delà de notre compréhension actuelle.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: And also a lead to the current whereabouts of the Ancients.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Et aussi un indice sur ce que sont devenus les Anciens.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Yet for now, this portal remains closed.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Mais pour le moment, ce portail reste fermé.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: In order for it to activate, its energy source needs to be sufficiently charged.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Pour pouvoir l'activer, sa source d'énergie doit être suffisamment chargée.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: As more seekers pass the Ku'lero temple, more energy should be channeled towards the portal.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Lorsque plus de \v[lore.title.seeker] passeront le \v[area.final-dng.name], plus d'énergie devrait être canalisée vers le portail.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: It is merely a matter of time before it opens.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Ce n'est qu'une question de temps avant qu'il ne s'ouvre.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Seeker, it is thanks to your contribution that we have come this far.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: \v[lore.title.seeker], c'est grâce à votre contribution que nous avons pu aller si loin.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: You have my deepest gratitude.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Nous vous en sommes très reconnaissants.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Once this portal has opened, I invite you to join our expedition.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Une fois que ce portail sera ouvert, je vous inviterais à rejoindre notre expédition.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: To raise Operation Trackwalker to a new level.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Pour porter l'Opération Retraçage vers de nouveaux cieux.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.note: vers de nouveaux horizons ? of course, but don't spoil it

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: To follow the Ancients...
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Pour suivre les Anciens...

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: ...and enter a \c[3]new world\c[0].
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: ... et entrer dans un \c[3]nouveau monde\c[0].

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: A new world will soon emerge...
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Un nouveau monde va bientôt émerger...

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig:
"New Horizons"
The new expansion to CrossWorlds
is currently still in development.

Release information will follow soon.
Stay tuned!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text:
"New Horizons"
La nouvelle suite de CrossWorlds
est encore en cours de développement.

La date de sortie sera bientôt annoncée.
Restez à l'écoute !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Hi!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Salut !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Ah!\. Look who's arrived!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Ah !\. Regarde qui arrive !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Lea, dear, you made it!\. Congratulations!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Lea, chérie, tu as réussi !\. Félicitations !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: No way...
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: C'est pas possible...

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: You're all here already?
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Vous êtes tous déjà là ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Beaten in the final dungeon, oh well...
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Battu dans le donjon final, et beh...

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Congratulations, chérie!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Félicitations, chérie !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Thanks!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Merci !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Oh well, who cares.\. It's not like I tried to be fast!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Et puis zut, peu importe.\. Ce n'est pas comme si j'avais essayé d'être rapide !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Hi!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Salut !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Hey there, Lea!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Hé salut, Lea !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Ha, I was first!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Ha, j'étais la première !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Don't worry dear, most of us just arrived.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Ne t'inquiète pas, mon cœur, la plupart d'entre nous venons juste d'arriver.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: True...\. that dungeon was seriously long.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Oui...\. ce donjon était vraiment long.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: More importantly: \c[3]Space Bird battle\c[0]!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Mais plus important : \c[3]le combat contre les Oiseaux de l'Espace\c[0] !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Finally we could fight those space birds!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Enfin on a pu combattre ces oiseaux de l'espace !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: They had it coming for wasting my time with their poetry!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Ils l'ont mérité, vu le temps qu'ils m'ont fait perdre avec tous leurs couplets !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Emilie, please, those are the Gods of the Ancients!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Emilie, s'il te plait, ce sont les Dieux des Anciens !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: We all should be grateful that we've finally found the Secret of the Ancients.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: On devrait tous être reconnaissant d'avoir enfin trouvé le Secret des Anciens.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: A portal to a new world!\. I knew it would be something like that!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Un portail vers un nouveau monde !\. Je savais que ce serait quelque chose comme ça !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Japp! It's the perfect way to make a sequel!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Japp ! Le moyen parfait pour faire une suite !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Can't wait to run another Track of the Ancients!\. Fantastic!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Je suis impatient de faire un autre Tracé des Anciens !\. Fantastique !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: ...Huh.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: ... Hein.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: GOT YOU GRASSHEAD!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: JE T'AI EU TÊTE D'HERBE !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: \s[5]WOOOHOOOO!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: \s[5]YOOUHOOOU !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Not so smug now that you run it for the first time, huh?
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Tu fais plus le malin quand tu cours un donjon pour la première fois, hein ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Hold on...
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Attends...

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Hello, everyone!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Bonjour, tout le monde !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: You see...
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Tu vois...

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: I took longer, because I was busy helping Joern out...
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: J'ai pris plus de temps, parce que j'étais occupé à aider Joern...

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Excuses.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: La belle excuse.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Hey, I never asked for any help.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Hé, j'ai jamais demandé de l'aide.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Phew...\. I guess that was it!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Pfiou...\. J'imagine que c'est bon !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Yeah...\. that was quite the boss fight.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Yeah...\. c'était un boss assez violent.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: They definitely worked hard on it.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Ils ont vraiment travaillé dur dessus.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Hi!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Salut !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Hey!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Hé !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Oh, Lea's already here?
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Oh, Lea est déjà là ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Beaten by your own clone!\. How does it feel, Shizuka?
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Battu par ton clone !\. Qu'est-ce que ça te fait, Shizuka ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: \s[5]Nyahahahahahahahahaha!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: \s[5]Nyahahahahahahahahaha !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Well, figures.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Oui, bon c'est évident.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: I'm not the one spending my whole time in the game.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Je ne suis pas celle qui passe tout mon temps dans le jeu, moi.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Speaking of...\. where's Tronny?
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: D'ailleurs...\. Où est Tronny ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: That's right, Tronny is the only person missing, it seems.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: C'est vrai, Tronny est la seule personne qui manque, on dirait.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Let's just wait a bit.\. I'm sure he'll show up.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Attendons un peu.\. Je suis sûr qu'il va bientôt arriver.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Uhm...\. scratch that.\. I just checked.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Euh...\. oublie ça.\. Je viens de vérifier.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: It seems he's back in Homestedt already?
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: On dirait qu'il est déjà de retour à \v[area.evo-village.name] ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Well, maybe he finished first?
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Bien, peut-être qu'il a fini en premier ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Anyway, that was a long session.\. I'll call it quits for today!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: En tout cas, cette partie était assez longue.\. Je vais arrêter là pour aujourd'hui !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Same...
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Pareil...

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Alrighty, I'm sure most of us here need a break.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: C'est bon, je suis sûr qu'on a presque tous besoin d'une pause.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: It was an honor playing with you all!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: C'était un honneur de jouer avec vous tous !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Have a good night!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Bonne nuit !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Hm...\. I have a bad feeling about Tronny.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Hm...\. J'ai un mauvais pressentiment pour Tronny.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: We should pay him a visit, non?
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: On devrait aller le voir, non ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: [nods]
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: [acquiesce]

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Alright,\. I'll wait for you at his house!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: OK,\. Je vais t'attendre devant sa maison !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Pay \c[3]C'tron\c[0] a visit in \c[3]Homestedt\c[0] together with Emilie.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Rendez visite à \c[3]C'tron\c[0] à \v[area.evo-village.name] avec Emilie.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: I have to wait...
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Il faut que j'attende...

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: I need to stay calm...
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Il faut que je reste calme...

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Stay with the flow of time...
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Que je reste dans le fleuve du temps...

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: ... until the release arrives.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: ... jusqu'à que ça sorte.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: [nods]
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: [acquiesce]

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Wait!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Attends !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Screw this.\. I'll log out.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Bon, ça suffit.\. Je vais me délogguer.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Logout
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Déconnexion

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Open the gate!!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Ouvrez le portail !!

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Dude, you heard the general!\. We gotta wait for the new game!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Mec, t'as entendu le général !\. Il faut qu'on attende le nouveau jeu !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: I can't wait!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Je ne peux pas attendre !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: It'll take them forever again, won't it?
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Ça va encore leur prendre des lustres, pas vrai ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: I'm sure it will be worth the wait!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Je suis sûr que ça vaudra le coup d'attendre !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Sloooooopes!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Pennnnnte !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: There you go...\. the final MacGuffin.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Enfin le voilà...\. le dernier MacGuffin.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: I can't believe it.\. They hid it at the very end.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: J'y crois pas.\. Ils l'ont caché tout à la fin.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: So...\. time to hit the beach?
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Donc...\. On retourne à la plage ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Maybe tomorrow.\. I've had enough for today.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Peut-être demain.\. J'ai eu ma dose pour aujourd'hui.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: We did it!\. Come on, admit it!\. It wasn't so bad!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: On a réussi !\. Allez, admet-le !\. C'était pas si mal !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: The final boss battle was literally in \c[3]SPACE\c[0]!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Le combat du boss de fin était littéralement dans l'\c[3]ESPACE\c[0] !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: AGAIN!\. What's their obsession with space?!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: ENCORE !\. C'est quoi leur obsession avec l'espace ?!

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: The gods of the Ancients are all about space, right? You could read that in the lore.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Les dieux des Anciens sont toujours dans l'espace, non ? Tu pouvais le lire dans le folklore.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Yeah of course, but STILL!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Oui bien sûr, MAIS QUAND MÊME !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: You know what I think? You don't seem nearly as distressed as you used to.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Tu sais ce que je pense ? Tu ne sembles pas aussi apeurée qu'avant.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: Well...\. I guess it wasn't quite as bad this time.
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Bon...\. J'imagine que c'était pas aussi difficile cette fois.

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: There you go!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Et voilà !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: I still hope their next game takes place on a planet with a perfectly flat and even surface!
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: J'espère quand même que leur prochain jeu aura lieu sur une planète avec une surface parfaitement plate !

extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.orig: That sounds terribly exciting...
extension/post-game/data/maps/final-dng/.text: Ça serait pas très intéressant...
